name: nestjs-demo-app--parent
description: Parent package for both the NestJS demo app. This is a set convenience scripts for running the app from the project root directory.
author: Wristband

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm start --prefix vue-frontend" "npm run dev --prefix nestjs-backend"
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix vue-frontend; npm install --prefix nestjs-backend
